channel.title: Torva/korasi/dung/nex boss/great Eco/ need staff!
channel.description:
Here at epic pkrz we strive to give our players the best game play the net has to offer. This server offers the old runescape detail and also the new fetures that many enjoy. The new fetures include every nex set with working hp boosts koasis sword dragon claws and every godsword. We are curently one of few 317 servers that have dung. We have friendly staff and hours upon hours of game play. we hope to see you here soon thank you for considering epicpkrz for your gaming needs.
Webclient-- http://www.rswebclients.com/play/epicpkrz
Downloadable client coming soon!
